name: Down to the Core
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 48

You play as Crys, a lone soldier in an endless struggle. You must descend into a chaotic simulation in a viscous computer, knowing that, should the chaos overcome you, you will never return.

Down to the Core is a fast-paced bullet hell, where the further you go, the harder it gets. Empower yourself as you descend. Challenge yourself - how far you can go, and can you reach the legendary Alpha Core.

Also don't forget to listen to the music it will make my composer happy.
